name: Dimensional Degradation
description:
The crazy scientist has done it! A strange dimensional rift to who knows where and now there is only one thing left to do…. enter the rift and explore the horrors, treasure and unknown that lies behind it.

Explore through different dimensions in search for upgrades, then when you are ready find and enter the exit rift to travel to the next dimension, but be weary of how long you spend within the confines of any given dimension as too much time spent in a dimension could prove to be a fatal mistake…

Controls:

Move [W][A][S][D]

Jump/Double Jump [SPACE]

Shoot [LEFT MOUSE]

Dash [LEFT SHIFT]

Interact [E]

Developed by Ty Victorson and Austin Castillo
